name: SiteCheckerServer
short_description:
This windows service will track user defined sites and will test for their response allowing you to see when the sites are down or respond slow.
It is a multi-process server that will run the checks on multiple thread, configurable by the user so it will not consume the computer resources while checking as many sites as possible.
The control interface connects to the server via tcp connection so it will be possible to connect from work/home workstation to the server and control and view the state of the site.
